column4: hi, I just installed ubuntu, from debian, Im trying to play some .avi's with tottem, but I get this error:There were no decoders found to handle the stream in file...... you might need to install the corresponding plugins
does anybody know what plugins is he talking about
well the totem, you get from the basic install 1.1.1
install totem-xine. the default gstreamer seems to be a little patchy unfortunately
well the xp is mounted in /dev/hdb1 as an NTFS
when u start the computer you get the grub window...
and when you choose WinXp, all it says is:root  (hd1,0)
most likely one of your grub boots isn't correct
any ideas how to fix it?
i'm not a grub expert i'm afraid...
thanks, and do u know how to get rid of it? I want my lilo back...
